record.title: MORNING BUSINESS
record.chair: Under the previous order, the Senate will proceed to a period of morning business with Senators permitted to speak for up to 10 minutes each.
In my capacity as a Senator from Rhode Island, I note the absence of a quorum.
record.narrative: The clerk will call the roll.
The legislative clerk proceeded to call the roll.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the order for the quorum call be rescinded.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
